Plot: A basketball player's father must try to convince him to go to a college so he can get a shorter sentence.
Title: He Got Game
Actors: Denzel Washington, Ray Allen, Milla Jovovich, Rosario Dawson
tomatoConsensus: Though not without its flaws, He Got Game finds Spike Lee at or near the top of his late-period game, combining trenchant commentary with his signature visuals and a strong performance from Denzel Washington.
